name: Undead Walking HD FREE
description:
Kill all the undead by your shotgun and try to hold on as more you can.
Story:
My name is Brando...I'm one of the survivors
undead are everywhere...they killed my family
my friends my dog...now I can just survive
to kill all of them!

Key features:
- Fantastic 3D pre-render graphics.
- Amazing animations.
- Good music keep you entertaining.
- Splat and gore effects.
- Increase your weapons.
- Two game modality, Normal and Sniper.
- Smooth Feeling Game Play.
- Play As More You Can.
- Mega strong Boss.
- Endless game play.

Destroy all the Undead, Very Intense Action!!!
